editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: On the Unity and Trinity of God. F-14r: First sermon on God's three-fold existence, ድርሳን ቀዳማይ በእንተ ፍካሬ ፫ ህላዌሁ. F-39v: Second sermon on God becoming Man, ድርሳን ቀዳማይ በእንተ ከሢተ ትስብእቱ ለወልድ. F-51v: Third sermon on the Interpretation of the Old Testament, ድርሳን ሣልሳይ በእንተ ትርጓሜ ብዙኀ ነገር እምአሪት. F-62r: Fourth sermon on the Interpretation of Passover and the Lamb of God, ድርሳን ራብዕ በእንተ ከሲተ ትርጓሚ ፍሥሕ. F-77r: Fifth sermon Explaining Spiritual Warfare, ድርሳን ኃምሰ በእንተ ከሚተ ፀብእ ዘየፀብአዎሙ. F-85v: Sixth sermon Explaining Honor of Sunday, ድርሳን ሳድስ በእንተ ከሲተ ክብሩ በዕለተ እኁድ. F-93r: Seventh sermon Explaining the Practice of Fasting on Wednesday and Friday, ድርሳን ፯ በእንተ ከሲተ ምክንደተ ጾም. F-101r: Eighth sermon Explaining about the Practice of Fasting, ድርሳን ሳምን በእንተ ከሲተ ጾም ምንት ውእቱ እፎ. F-110v: Ninth sermon Explaining the Victory of Christ's Crucifixion over Death, ድርሳን ታስዕ በእንተ ከሢተ ውእቱ ሞት ዘሞአ. 110v-121r: Tenth sermon Explaining Patience in True Faith, ድርሳን ዓሥር በእንተ ከሲተ ጽንዓ ሃይማኖት ርትዕት. F-137v: Eleventh sermon on the Interpretation of the Praises of Moses and Miriam, ድርሳን ፲ወ፩ በእንተ ትርጓሚ ስብሐት ሙሴ ወማርያም. F-143r: Twelfth sermon on the Confession of Believers and their Patience in Adversity, ድርሳን ፲ወ፪ በእንተ ኑዛዜ መሃይምናን.
